scripts.bundle-: cd super-app && yarn install && npx expo export && cd .. && mkdir -p updates && rsync -av super-app/dist/ updates/
scripts.bundle: cd super-app && rm -rf dist/ && yarn && npx expo export && cd ..
scripts.copy: mkdir -p public/updates/1/$(date +%s) && cp -a super-app/dist/* public/updates/1/$(date +%s)/ && node scripts/exportClientExpoConfig.js > public/updates/1/$(date +%s)/expoConfig.json
